alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 5:44PM EDT until July 30 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Southeastern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 544 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midway to near Tallahassee to 8 miles east of Florida A and M, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Havana, Florida A and M, Quincy, Doak Campbell Stadium, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Jamieson, Miccosukee, South City, Griffin Heights, Governors Square Mall, Midtown, Lake Talquin, Levy Park, Indian Head Acres and Chaires Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
